title: TP_1 Timer Function Block
description:
ISC_UPPER tests whether a sign IN is a captial letter, if IN is a capital let￾ter, the function returns TRUE, if not the function returns FALSE. In exami￾ning the Global Setup EXTENDED_ASCII constant is considered. If EXTEN￾DED_ASCII = TRUE the extended ASCII character-set to be considered in
accordance with ISO 8859-1.
The The following table describes the character codes:
Code EXTENDED_ASCII=TRUE EXTENDED_ASCII = FASLE
0..64,91..191,215, 223..255 FALSE FALSE
65..90 TRUE TRUE
192..214 TRUE FALSE
216..222 TRUE FALSE
name: TP_1

input.name: IN
input.description: Boolean input that starts the timing operation when set to TRUE.

input.name: PT
input.description: Duration for which the output Q remains TRUE after IN is activated.

input.name: RST
input.description: Boolean input that resets the output Q to FALSE when set to TRUE.

output.name: Q
output.description: Boolean output that indicates the status of the timer; TRUE when timing is active, otherwise FALSE.
